data.title: Allow sequences to define sprite offsets
data.body: There are a bunch of places that hardcode x,y offsets in order to work around sprites that aren't centered within their shp. These should be moved into the sequence definitions.

data.title: Renderer refactoring - Renderables

milestone.title: June 2013 Playtest
milestone.description: Things that need testing first because they could jeopardize a stable release.

data.body:
This streamlines the creation and drawing of Renderables, dropping a lot of accumlated cruft and adding support for alternative renderable types in the future (voxels, laser zaps, range circles).

Renderables have been generalized from additional Sprite state to an interface describing "something that can draw itself", positioned using world coordinates.

I've tested that the common cases display properly, but I there may be edge cases i've missed - resulting in offset sprites or incorrect draw orders.

data.title: Change default unit stance to defend for land units and returnfire for cloaked units
data.body: Nobody actually wants them to default to AttackAnything.

data.title: Unify turret rendering traits
data.body:
This replaces RenderUnitTurreted, RenderUnitTurretedAim and RenderBuildingSeparateTurret with a WithTurret rendering addon (used with RenderUnit/RenderBuilding).

This also allows units with multiple turrets use different artwork for each.

data.title: Renderer refactoring - SheetBuilder

milestone.title: June 2013 Playtest
milestone.description: Things that need testing first because they could jeopardize a stable release.

data.body:
This extends SheetBuilder to be suitable for the voxel renderer and tidies related code.
An AsBitmap() function has been added for exporting a Sheet to disk (useful for debugging batch problems or grabbing all the sprite artwork at once).

data.title: Added OpenAL and SDL Windows dependency DLLs to mirrors

milestone.title: June 2013 Playtest
milestone.description: Things that need testing first because they could jeopardize a stable release.

data.body: This fixes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/wiki/FAQ#the-downloads-during-windows-installation-and-first-game-start-dont-work as it is a common annoyance that the SDL/OpenAL webserver went down when somebody tried to run the OpenRA Setup.exe only this time it happened during the first minutes after the stable release announcement when I tried to prepare the patch for Desura which required a clean install so I noticed when a file got removed in my proposed patch there and could help people immediately. http://www.libsdl.org/ was online again after a short while so this is not urgent.

data.title: Lobby Crash
data.body:
Exception of type `System.InvalidOperationException`: Sequence contains no elements
   at System.Linq.Enumerable.Single[TSource](IEnumerable`1 source)
   at OpenRA.Server.Server.DropClient(Connection toDrop)
   at OpenRA.Server.Server.DispatchOrdersToClient(Connection c, Int32 client, Int32 frame, Byte[] data)
   at OpenRA.Server.Server.DispatchOrdersToClients(Connection conn, Int32 frame, Byte[] data)
   at OpenRA.Server.Server.SendMessage(String text)
   at OpenRA.Server.Server.DropClient(Connection toDrop)
   at OpenRA.Server.Server.DispatchOrdersToClient(Connection c, Int32 client, Int32 frame, Byte[] data)
   at OpenRA.Server.Server.DispatchOrdersToClients(Connection conn, Int32 frame, Byte[] data)
   at OpenRA.Server.Server.DispatchOrders(Connection conn, Int32 frame, Byte[] data)
   at OpenRA.Server.Server.SyncLobbyInfo()

   at OpenRA.Server.Server.InterpretServerOrders(Connection conn, Byte[] data)
   at OpenRA.Server.Connection.ReadData(Server server)

.
think i have already filed this for previous playtests. but it is still in the release :(

lobby is fine with 2 people in it, but on the third it starts dropping players, which gets worse with more players joining,

data.title: Freeze while extracting SCORE.AUD (Dune 2000)
data.body:
As the title implies, OpenRA freezes every time I download the Dune 2000 files, only to freeze when it gets to SCORE.AUD (`System.UnauthorizedAccessException`)

Here's the log: http://pastebin.com/HxhT74pf

data.title: Game events notification
data.body:
Maybe there could be an option (checbox) to enable/disable "game events notifications" like a building that has been destroyed ?

Sometimes when a player uses the Ion Cannon or the Nuke bomb against some of my buildings, they get destroyed too quickly for me to know what have been destroyed (especially if my current view is not focussed on my base).

With such a notification, I would be able to know how many and which buildings have been destroyed. What was there before the strike.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/321281-game-events-notification?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Disable order generators when the menu is open / game paused
data.body: If you have the PlaceBuilding order generator active then open the menu the building will follow your cursor around behind the menu. This looks particularly bad in C&C, but probably isn't wanted anywhere.

data.title: Update CHANGELOG for release-20130514.

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body:
Thanks to @Mailaender and @psydev for collating
the changes, and to eyen from IRC for copy editing.

data.title: Download maps asynchronously in lobby
data.body: Currently this is done synchronously and produces a massive jank.

data.title: Dune2 mod
data.body:
I know there are several open-source projects about Dune2 but it would be cool to be able to play it with OpenRA too, with a mod.

The mod could have some enhancements like a checkbox to enable/disable the multiple units selection. 

This way, players who want to keep the original gameplay as it was, could still enjoy the mod.

Links:
http://forum.dune2k.com/forum/12-dune-ii/
http://dunedynasty.sourceforge.net/

Usuful tools:
http://forum.dune2k.com/topic/19752-list-of-dune-ii-editing-tools/
http://duneii.com/downloads/

data.title: Power Sabotage on Spy Infiltration
data.body: Give a 1 min. blackout when infilitrating power plants.

data.title: Vehicle Thief / Hijacker
data.body:
Proposed balancing
- unarmed
- not stealthed, can't disguise
- 2x hitpoints of e1
- does not crouch and slowdown when hit
- requires allied tech center

https://github.com/scottnz/openra/compare/thief

TODO:
- [x] AI needs to remove the stolen vehicle from it's squads and stop trying to issue orders on them (detected as an exploit). Should be resolved in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/commit/1a33608b73602338663f7200c65fb12bdc2656c7
- [x] Enter needs to intercept moving targets or at least update the route every once and a while #4437

Maybe in the future, it will be possible to support Dark Reign 1 as a mod ?

data.title: D2K - added forgotten_path map by Holloweye
Avoid notification spam when the build palette is left-clicked

milestone.title: June 2013 Playtest
milestone.description: Things that need testing first because they could jeopardize a stable release.

data.body: and the player queues more of the same, fixes #2361.

data.title: Removed inconstencies in alliance checks
data.body:
introduced by incomplete per-player shroud migration / observer detection hacks for
- various cash ticks (donate, bounty, ...)
- GPS dots #3181
- unit ranks
- support power charge bars #3178
- power down indicator
- spy disguise radar color override

which fixes various small bugs attached to it.

data.title: New game mode : Shared base & resources
data.body:
What about adding a new option to pool resources between members of the same team ?

Let's say there is a 2vs2 game.. each team would share ORE, energy power, ...
However units would not be shared, each player would still be able to control his own ones.

This could make these kind of games a little bit more stressful and tense but it would be interesting to see players working together more closely.

data.title: Add lobby option for building off allies
data.body: This would break most team-basewalking completely.

data.title: Added optional AsyncPing to GameServer listing
data.body: I do not give up on this because I wasted a lot of time on polishing before I heard of the decision to remove the feature entirely. This is an improved version that fixes all the papercuts related to it.

data.title: Fixes #3216 zombie aircraft staying in the air
data.body: I think `ReturnOnIdle` was busted because this never happened with helicopters. Tested this with lot's of planes on Ice Woods against creep anti-air.

data.title: Revert "Players and bots surrender on disconnect."
data.body: Client.State is set via an immediate order, so anything relying on it can and does desync.
